text: læa chay dxn di klaw meux kar ngan di thuk tadsin læw wa “thæ cring xallxh di thrng sayya phwk than sung pen sayya hæng khwam cring læa chan di sayya phwk than læw chan di bidphliw phwk than chan mimi xa nac dı«henux phwk than nxkcak chan di reiyk rxng phwk than læw phwk than k txb snxng chan dangnan phwk than xya di pranam chan tæthwa cng pranam taw phwk than xeng chan mi xac rxngthukkh thæn phwk than di læa phwk than k mi xac rxngthukkh thæn chan (cak kar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxh) di thæcring chan di ptiseth tx sing thi phwk than tang chan hı pen phakhi (kab xallxh) tæ kxn ni thæcring brrda phu xthrrm nan sahrab phwk khea khux kar lngthosʹ xyang cebpwd”
